string.value: What does it mean to be a Warrior? Talk to #p1002101# in Lith Harbor.

#p1002101# in Lith Harbor says you can choose to become a #bWarrior#k if you're at least #bLevel 10#k. He tells you to see #r#p1022000##k in #rPerion#k. If you'd like to walk there, check your World Map. (#rW#k)
You learned what it takes to be a true Warrior from #p1022000#. You have a feeling this is the right path for you.
Ah, a Warrior, eh? You chose that because I look so proud as a Warrior, right? Once you're ready, press ACCEPT.
A #rWarrior#k favors #bstrength(STR)#k with a bit of dexterity (DEX). Head over to #rPerion#k to talk to #b#p1022000##k.
Passing by me and go further, you can find #bWarrior Statue#k to teleport to #bPerion#k.
Not so sure you want to be a Warrior? Fair enough. Once you decided on a job, come talk to me.
Are you here to become a Warrior? Then you've come to the right place...
Once you get to #bLevel 10#k, I can transform you into a #bWarrior#k. Please see me when you're ready to take the next step.
You haven't gone to see #b#p1022000##k yet? He's in #rPerion#k.
